SEARCH
Package suggestion

Class SuggestionControl

Object
SuggestionControl
All Implemented Interfaces:
IControl, ISuggestion
public class SuggestionControl extends Object implements IControl, ISuggestion
Represents the suggestion manager that contains the controls for all of the suggestions that can be used by User
Author:
Gokul Ramesh
